OHOS::VirtualDeviceEvent¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Graphic

Description:

Defines a virtual device event, which is used to receive a customized input event and call back the listening function registered.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Summary¶

Public Types¶

Public Type Name

Description

DeviceType

Enumerates virtual device types.
